name: Progression (Ruka)
description:
Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #3, with the theme of "Cycle". Done on very little sleep and with a lot of cut content. I FINISHED THIS AT 7 AM IN THE MORNING I DIDN'T SLEEP ALL NIGHT IT'S VERY BUGGY. I'M SORRY

WARNING: DO NOT PRESS X UNTIL PROMPTED UNLESS YOU WANT TO BUG THE GAME I DON'T KNOW HOW TO FIX IT, SORRY

The game ends when you rest at the lake. It's not a glitch - that is the way the game is supposed to end.

Controls:

Arrow keys: move left and right

Up: interaction with icons
